snippet.title: TV host faces surgery for heart disease
snippet.content: TV personality and euthanasia advocate Andrew Denton has been diagnosed with heart disease and will undergo bypass surgery. Denton is the director of Go Gentle Australia, an organisation campaigning to legalise euthanasia, and previously hosted ABC TV interview program, Enough Rope. "He has recently been diagnosed with fairly advanced heart disease and will be undergoing bypass surgery shortly, " Gina McColl, Go Gentle Australia spokesperson told AAP.
